description.value:
Ancient Star maps. When used by a Navigator, they may skip locating the Astronomicon if they pass a -10 Forbidden Lore (Warp) Test, also gives +15 to Navigation (Warp) Tests per DoS. Failiure means locating Astronomicon as usual. If astronomicon not located, -20 to Warp Encounter Table.

Requirements

Poor Craftsmanship needs -20 Test, Good needs +0, Best needs +10

Effect: Extremely Rare

Notes: -

system.effect: Ancient Star maps. When used by a Navigator, they may skip locating the Astronomicon if they pass a -10 Forbidden Lore (Warp) Test, also gives +15 to Navigation (Warp) Tests per DoS. Failiure means locating Astronomicon as usual. If astronomicon not located, -20 to Warp Encounter Table.
